nieuweStandaard.title: The new standard!
nieuweStandaard.paragraph1: After six years of providing food trucks to the country's largest public events, we decided to use this solid experience to create THE ultimate catering concept, The Food Truck Club. With The Food Truck Club, we bring together eight high-quality food truck concepts under one roof.
nieuweStandaard.paragraph2: Our clients always benefit from a single point of contact, whether you want to rent a single food truck or a complete food court of 12 food trucks. This way, we maintain direct communication and organizing your event becomes much simpler. Because you're dealing directly with the source, renting food trucks from us is often more advantageous.
